mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, JHLX, PXLB, KCID, FXBS, KS, PXXS, KSXS, ZRR, PXJG, XT, FJJX, ZY, JH_KSRQ, JH_KSSJ, JH_JSRQ, JH_JSSJ, SJ_KSRQ, SJ_KSSJ, SJ_JSRQ, SJ_JSSJ, KCDD, KCNR, JSID, JSXM, PXDX, PXYS, PXYS_BZ, JS_BZ, IS_JCFF, SJKS, YCRS, SCRS, BZ, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZDJSRID, ZDJSRQ, ZDJSYY

B.ID, B.DPRTCODE, B.JHLX, B.PXLB, B.KCID, B.FXBS, B.KS, B.PXXS, B.KSXS, B.ZRR, B.PXJG, B.XT, B.FJJX, B.ZY, B.JH_KSRQ,B.JH_KSSJ, B.JH_JSRQ, B.JH_JSSJ, B.SJ_KSRQ, B.SJ_KSSJ, B.SJ_JSRQ, B.SJ_JSSJ, B.KCDD, B.KCNR, B.JSID, B.JSXM, B.PXDX, B.PXYS, B.PXYS_BZ, B.JS_BZ, B.IS_JCFF, B.SJKS, B.YCRS, B.SCRS, B.BZ, B.ZT, B.WHBMID, B.WHRID, B.WHSJ, B.ZDJSRID, B.ZDJSRQ, B.ZDJSYY, BP003.ID as CID,BP003.KCBH as CKCBH,BP003.KCMC as CKCMC,BP003.ZQZ as CZQZ,BP003.ZQDW as CZQDW,BP003.FJJX as CFJJX, U.ID as ZDRID,U.USERNAME as ZDRUSERNAME,U.REALNAME as ZDRREALNAME
mapper.select:
select
,U3.USERNAME AS JUSERNAME ,U3.REALNAME AS JREALNAME ,DPRT.DPRTNAME ,BP00201.ID AS PID ,BP00201.WXRYDAID AS PWXRYDAID ,BP00201.XM AS PXM ,BP00201.GZDW AS PGZDW ,BP00201.CQL AS BCQL ,BP00201.ZS AS BZS ,BP00201.CJ AS BCJ ,BP00201.XCPXRQ AS BXCPXRQ ,BP00201.BZ AS BZB ,BP00201.KHJG AS BKHJG ,BP00201.IS_YC AS BIS_YC ,BP00201.IS_SC AS BIS_SC ,bz001.XM BZXM ,bz001.rybh BZRYBH from B_P_002 B JOIN B_P_003 BP003 ON B.KCID = BP003.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON B.WHRID = U.ID left join T_USER U3 on B.ZDJSRID = U3.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT DPRT ON DPRT.ID = B.DPRTCODE LEFT JOIN B_P_00201 BP00201 ON BP00201.PXJHID = B.ID AND BP00201.ZT = 1 and BP00201.IS_YC = 1 LEFT JOIN (select B_Z_001.id,B_Z_001.xm,B_Z_001.rybh,B_Z_001.ZT from B_Z_001 order by B_Z_001.WBBS asc,B_Z_001.SZDW desc,B_Z_001.RYBH desc )bz001 ON BP00201.wxrydaid = bz001.ID AND bz001.ZT=1 where B.ZT != 8
order by B.jh_ksrq DESC,BP003.KCBH asc
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select
,BP00201.ID AS PID ,BP00201.WXRYDAID AS PWXRYDAID ,BP00201.XM AS PXM ,BP00201.GZDW AS PGZDW ,BP00201.CQL AS BCQL ,BP00201.ZS AS BZS ,BP00201.CJ AS BCJ ,BP00201.XCPXRQ AS BXCPXRQ ,BP00201.BZ AS BZB ,BP00201.KHJG AS BKHJG ,BP00201.IS_YC AS BIS_YC ,BP00201.IS_SC AS BIS_SC ,BZ.RYBH AS BZRYBH ,BZ.XM AS BZXM ,BZ.ID AS BID from B_P_002 B LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON B.WHRID = U.ID LEFT JOIN B_P_003 BP003 ON B.KCID = BP003.ID LEFT JOIN B_P_00201 BP00201 ON BP00201.PXJHID = B.ID AND BP00201.ZT = 1 LEFT JOIN B_Z_001 BZ ON BZ.ID = BP00201.WXRYDAID where B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
,U3.USERNAME AS JUSERNAME ,U3.REALNAME AS JREALNAME ,DPRT.DPRTNAME ,D011.ATTACHCOUNT from B_P_002 B JOIN B_P_003 BP003 ON B.KCID = BP003.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAINID,COUNT(1) AS ATTACHCOUNT FROM D_011 GROUP BY MAINID) D011 ON D011.MAINID = BP003.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON B.WHRID = U.ID left join T_USER U3 on B.ZDJSRID = U3.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT DPRT ON DPRT.ID = B.DPRTCODE where B.ZT != 8
order by B.jh_ksrq DESC,BP003.KCBH asc
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

sql.if: and ( UPPER(BP003.KCBH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(BP003.KCMC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.KCDD) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.BZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

paramsMap != null and paramsMap.fxbsList != null and paramsMap.fxbsList != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.idList != null and paramsMap.idList != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.ztList != null and paramsMap.ztList != ''

mapper.select:
select
,U3.USERNAME AS JUSERNAME ,U3.REALNAME AS JREALNAME ,DPRT.DPRTNAME ,D011.ATTACHCOUNT from B_P_002 B JOIN B_P_003 BP003 ON B.KCID = BP003.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAINID,COUNT(1) AS ATTACHCOUNT FROM D_011 GROUP BY MAINID) D011 ON D011.MAINID = BP003.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON B.WHRID = U.ID left join T_USER U3 on B.ZDJSRID = U3.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT DPRT ON DPRT.ID = B.DPRTCODE where B.ZT != 8
order by B.jh_ksrq DESC,BP003.KCBH asc
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

sql.if: and ( UPPER(kcmc) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(kcbh) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(jsxm) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(kcdd) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.pxDateBegin != null and paramsMap.pxDateBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.pxDateEnd != null and paramsMap.pxDateEnd != ''

mapper.select:
SELECT rownum id,state, cid,kcbh as CKCBH,kcmc as CKCMC,jh_ksrq,jh_kssj,jh_jsrq,jh_jssj,kcdd,pxlb,pxjg,zrr,pxdx,jsxm,fxbs,pxxs,ksxs,ks,whsj,dprtcode,zt,jsid FROM( select rownum,1 state,t3.id as cid,t3.kcbh,t3.kcmc,t1.jh_ksrq,t1.jh_kssj,t1.jh_jsrq,t1.jh_jssj,t1.kcdd,t1.pxlb,t1.pxjg,t1.zrr,t1.pxdx,t1.jsxm,t1.fxbs,t1.pxxs,t1.ksxs,t1.ks,t1.whsj,t1.dprtcode,t1.zt,t4.wxryid as jsid from b_p_002 t1 join b_p_003 t3 on t1.kcid=t3.id and t3.zt=1 left join b_p_00201 t2 on t1.id=t2.pxjhid and t2.zt=1 and t2.is_yc=1 left join b_z_001 t4 on t3.id=t2.wxrydaid UNION all select rownum,2 state,t3.id as cid,t3.kcbh,t3.kcmc,t1.jh_ksrq,t1.jh_kssj,t1.jh_jsrq,t1.jh_jssj,t1.kcdd,t1.pxlb,t1.pxjg,t1.zrr,t1.pxdx,t1.jsxm,t1.fxbs,t1.pxxs,t1.ksxs,t1.ks,t1.whsj,t1.dprtcode,t1.zt,t2.wxryid as jsid from b_p_002 t1 left join b_z_001 t2 on t1.jsid=t2.wxryid left join b_p_003 t3 on t1.kcid=t3.id and t3.zt=1 )
WHERE 1=1
order by WHSJ DESC
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

sql.if: and ( UPPER(kcmc) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(kcbh) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(jsxm) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(kcdd) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.pxDateBegin != null and paramsMap.pxDateBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.pxDateEnd != null and paramsMap.pxDateEnd != ''

mapper.insert: insert into B_P_002 (ID, DPRTCODE, JHLX, PXLB, KCID, FXBS, KS, PXXS, KSXS, ZRR, PXJG, XT, FJJX, ZY, JH_KSRQ, JH_KSSJ, JH_JSRQ, JH_JSSJ, SJ_KSRQ, SJ_KSSJ, SJ_JSRQ, SJ_JSSJ, KCDD, KCNR, JSID, JSXM, PXDX, PXYS, PXYS_BZ, JS_BZ, IS_JCFF, SJKS, YCRS, SCRS, BZ, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZDJSRID, ZDJSRQ, ZDJSYY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pxlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pxxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pxjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jhKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jhJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pxdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pxysBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isJcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sjks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zdjsrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdjsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zdjsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update B_P_002
JHLX = #{jhlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PXLB = #{pxlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCID = #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FXBS = #{fxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KS = #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXXS = #{pxxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXS = #{ksxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZRR = #{zrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXJG = #{pxjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XT = #{xt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZY = #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH_KSRQ = #{jhKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JH_KSSJ = #{jhKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH_JSRQ = #{jhJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JH_JSSJ = #{jhJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJ_KSRQ = #{sjKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SJ_KSSJ = #{sjKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJ_JSRQ = #{sjJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJ_JSSJ = #{sjJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCDD = #{kcdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCNR = #{kcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSID = #{jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSXM = #{jsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXDX = #{pxdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXYS = #{pxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PXYS_BZ = #{pxysBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JS_BZ = #{jsBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_JCFF = #{isJcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SJKS = #{sjks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YCRS = #{ycrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCRS = #{scrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = sysdate,
ZDJSRID = #{zdjsrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDJSRQ = sysdate,
ZDJSYY = #{zdjsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_P_002 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JHLX = #{jhlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PXLB = #{pxlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCID = #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FXBS = #{fxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KS = #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXXS = #{pxxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXS = #{ksxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZRR = #{zrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXJG = #{pxjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XT = #{xt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZY = #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_KSRQ = #{jhKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JH_KSSJ = #{jhKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_JSRQ = #{jhJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JH_JSSJ = #{jhJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SJ_KSRQ = #{sjKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJ_KSSJ = #{sjKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SJ_JSRQ = #{sjJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJ_JSSJ = #{sjJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCDD = #{kcdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCNR = #{kcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSID = #{jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSXM = #{jsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXDX = #{pxdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXYS = #{pxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PXYS_BZ = #{pxysBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JS_BZ = #{jsBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_JCFF = #{isJcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SJKS = #{sjks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YCRS = #{ycrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCRS = #{scrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZDJSRID = #{zdjsrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDJSRQ = #{zdjsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZDJSYY = #{zdjsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update B_P_002 B set B.ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, B.WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, B.WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, B.WHSJ = sysdate where B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_P_002 set JHLX = #{jhlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PXLB = #{pxlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCID = #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FXBS = #{fxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KS = #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXXS = #{pxxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXS = #{ksxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZRR = #{zrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXJG = #{pxjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XT = #{xt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZY = #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH_KSRQ = to_date(to_char(#{jhKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),
JH_KSSJ = #{jhKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH_JSRQ = to_date(to_char(#{jhJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),
JH_JSSJ = #{jhJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCDD = #{kcdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCNR = #{kcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSID = #{jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSXM = #{jsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXDX = #{pxdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PXYS = #{pxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PXYS_BZ = #{pxysBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JS_BZ = #{jsBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_JCFF = #{isJcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YCRS = #{ycrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = sysdate where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: and ( UPPER(B.JSXM) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(BP003.KCBH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(BP003.KCMC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.KCDD) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.ZRR) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.BZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

paramsMap != null and paramsMap.jhrqBegin != null and paramsMap.jhrqBegin != ''

mapper.select: select B.ID,B.JH_KSRQ,B.JH_KSSJ,B.JH_JSRQ,B.JH_JSSJ,B.SJ_KSRQ,B.SJ_KSSJ,B.SJ_JSRQ,B.SJ_JSSJ,B.FXBS, B.ZT,B.SJKS,B.KS,B.YCRS,B.SCRS,C.KCBH as CKCBH,C.KCMC as CKCMC,C.FJJX as CFJJX from b_p_002 B LEFT JOIN b_p_003 C ON C.ID = B.Kcid WHERE B.JSID=#{jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and B.ZT IN (0,1,10)
SELECT ID,USERNAME,REALNAME FROM T_USER WHERE JGDM=#{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into B_P_002 (ID, DPRTCODE, JHLX, PXLB, KCID, FXBS, KS, PXXS, KSXS, ZRR, PXJG, XT, FJJX, ZY, JH_KSRQ, JH_KSSJ, JH_JSRQ, JH_JSSJ, SJ_KSRQ, SJ_KSSJ, SJ_JSRQ, SJ_JSSJ, KCDD, KCNR, JSID, JSXM, PXDX, PXYS, PXYS_BZ, JS_BZ, IS_JCFF, SJKS, YCRS, SCRS, BZ, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZDJSRID, ZDJSRQ, ZDJSYY)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jhlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.pxlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pxxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ksxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pxjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jhKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.jhKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jhJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.jhJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sjKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sjKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sjJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sjJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kcdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pxdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.pxysBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jsBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.isJcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.sjks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ycrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.scrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{item.zdjsrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zdjsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.zdjsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update B_P_002
JHLX = #{jhlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PXLB = #{pxlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCID = #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FXBS = #{fxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KS = #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXXS = #{pxxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXS = #{ksxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZRR = #{zrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXJG = #{pxjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XT = #{xt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZY = #{zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJ_KSRQ = #{sjKsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SJ_KSSJ = #{sjKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJ_JSRQ = #{sjJsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJ_JSSJ = #{sjJssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCDD = #{kcdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCNR = #{kcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSID = #{jsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSXM = #{jsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXDX = #{pxdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PXYS = #{pxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PXYS_BZ = #{pxysBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JS_BZ = #{jsBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_JCFF = #{isJcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SJKS = #{sjks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YCRS = #{ycrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCRS = #{scrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = sysdate,
ZDJSRID = #{zdjsrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDJSRQ = sysdate,
ZDJSYY = #{zdjsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
